channel.title: Reign Radio
channel.description: A high energy mix of the nations chart-toppers! Listen to commercial free, seamlessly mixed music from some of today's hottest artists and producers.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A high energy mix of the nations chart-toppers!
channel.itunes:author: Reign Radio
channel.itunes:summary: A high energy mix of the nations chart-toppers! Listen to commercial free, seamlessly mixed music from some of today's hottest artists and producers.

item.title: Reign Radio - Episode 17
item.description: Reign Radio delivers a high energy non-stop, commercial free mix of the worlds latest radio and dance hits ... This episode with new music from David Guetta, Usher, Rihanna and Miike Snow. http://djreign.ca | http://twitter.com/majorreign Episode 17 Track Listing; I Can't Stop (Benzi & DJA Edit) - Flux Pavillion Ft Jay Z and Kanye West Make It Bun Dem (Chris James Edit) - Skrillex & Damien Marley Birthday Cake (Proper Villians Remix) - Rihanna Midnight City (Viol8ters Edit) - M83 Scream - Usher Rolling Stones T-Shirt (Chuckie Remix) - Dada Life Wild Ones - David Guetta Ft Sia Titanium - David Guetta Ft Sia The Wave (Thomas Gold Remix) - Miike Snow More mixes available at http://mixcloud.com/reign

item.title: Reign Radio - Episode 11
item.description: Commercial free mixes of today's hottest music from around the nations ... This episode w/ new music from Crystal Castles, Rihanna, Lil Wayne and others! Hiphop in the front, electronic in the back. Bottoms Up - Tres Songz; Get Back Up - TI Feat Chris Brown; Sprites and Monsters - Skrillex; The Time (Dirty Bit) - Black Eyed Peas; Malo - Avicii; Sofi Needs a Ladder - Deadmau5; Who's That Chick - Rihanna; Not In Love - Crystal Castles ... Follow @jreign | Visit http://jreign.com!!!
item.dc:creator: Reign Radio

item.title: Reign Radio - May
item.description: Commercial free mixes of today's hottest music from around the nations ... This episode w/ new music from Kanye West, Tiesto, Example and others! Hiphop in the front, electronic in the back. ... It's massive on the house/electro jams ... with summer fast approaching, it's just what we're feelin! Power - Kanye West Pass Out (Reign Intro) - Tinie Tempah Kickstart - Example C'mon - Tiesto Vs. Clinto Sparks My Feelings For You - Avicii Let Me Sip My Drink (DJ Chuckie RMX) - Robby Rivera Ft Fast Eddie ADD SUV (Armand Van Helden RMX) - Uffie Ft Pharrell We No Speak Americano - Yolanda Be Cool Hold Yuh Remix - Gyptian Ft Nicki Minaj Visit http://jreign.com!
